meaning: My condolences / Restrain grief and accept the inevitable
description: From the Record of Rites... Used to express condolences to the bereaved.

examples.chinese: 希望你节哀顺变,保重身体
examples.translation: Hope you restrain your grief and take care of yourself

examples.chinese: 这件事很惋惜,节哀顺变
examples.translation: This is very regrettable, my condolences

examples.chinese: 看到真的不知道说什么,家人节哀顺变吧
examples.translation: Don't know what to say, condolences to the family
